job.title: Software Engineer / Node / 100% Remote
job.industry: Computer Software,Information Services,Information Technology and Services
job.description: We are Actively seeking a Software Engineer/Node to join our team on a permanent basis. In this position you will work on SCRUM team that is creating APIs written as microservices via NodeJS as AWS Lambda functions within a serverless architecture. We offer 100% remote work, 100% paid health care, 401K with Match, Bonus, and an excellent opportunity for advancement. Desired Skills 3+ years of Software Engineering experienceProficiency in JavaScript and TypeScript running on Node.jsAbility to create APIs written as microservices via NodeJS as AWS Lambda functions within a serverless architectureStrong experience with SQL, MySQL or NoSQL database design and implementation?Strong understanding of building and using REST APIsInterest in moving into API architecture and designExperience working in an agile development environment with remote team members
